{{Use dmy dates|date=June 2018}} {{Use Indian English|date=June 2018}} {{Infobox settlement | name = Godadara | native_name = Godadra bridge | native_name_lang = | other_name = | nickname = | settlement_type = city | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | pushpin_map = India Gujarat#India | pushpin_label_position = right | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Gujarat, India | coordinates = {{coord|21.17913|N|72.874374|E|display=inline,title}} | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{flag|India}} | subdivision_type1 = [[States and territories of India|State]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Gujarat]] | subdivision_type2 = [[List of districts of India|District]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Surat district|Surat]] | established_title = <!-- Established --> | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | parts_type = [[Taluka]]s | parts = Choryasi | government_type = | governing_body = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_rank = | area_total_km2 = 8.12 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 13 | population_total = 39870 | population_as_of = 2009 | population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_footnotes = | demographics_type1 = Languages | demographics1_title1 = Official | demographics1_info1 = [[Gujarati ,Bhojpuri, Avdhi language|Gujarati]], [[Hindi language|Hindi]] | timezone1 = [[Indian Standard Time|IST]] | utc_offset1 = +5:30 | postal_code_type = <!-- [[Postal Index Number|PIN]] -->395010 | postal_code = 395010 | area_code_type = Telephone code | area_code = 0261 | registration_plate = GJ-5 | website = {{URL|gujaratindia.com}} | footnotes = }} '''Godadra''' was a [[city]] and a [[Municipality]] in [[Surat district]] in the [[India]]n [[States and territories of India|state]] of [[Gujarat]]. The town comes under Greater Surat. Godadara is one of the eight amalgamated municipalities in Surat and was added to [[Limbayat]] Zone.
== Geography == The city is located at <ref>[http://www.fallingrain.com/world/IN/9/Godadra.html Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Godadra]{{Dead link|date=December 2019 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }}</ref> an average elevation of 15 metres (66 feet).
==Demographics== {{As of|2001}} India [[census]],<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.censusindia.net/results/town.php?stad=A&state5=999|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20040616075334/http://www.censusindia.net/results/town.php?stad=A&state5=999|archivedate=2004-06-16|title= Census of India 2001: Data from the 2001 Census, including cities, villages and towns (Provisional)|accessdate=2008-11-01|publisher= Census Commission of India}}</ref> Godadra had a population of 21870 . Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Sachin has an average literacy rate of 74%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 81%, and female literacy is 63%. In Sachin, 14% of the population is under 6 years of age.
== Transport == By road: Godadra is 14 km from Udhana and 8 km from Surat. There is Deepak Gas agency. Gyan Sagar Hindi school, Manny schools.
By air: Nearest airport is Surat which is 30 km from Godadra.
